name: Arthur's Grove
description:
Arthur's Grove is an entertaining 2D adventure game based off similar classical game such as The Legend of Zelda and Final Fantasy. You play as Arthur who explores the Forest Grove seeking adventure and to achieve greatness.

The game itself is a free download. Enjoy! If you would like to support the developer or are interested in extending Arthur's Grove for your own game development needs be sure to purchase the source code for $1.99. It is greatly appreciated and helps continue the development of more fun retro games like Arthur's Grove!

Use the arrow keys to move around and the left ctrl and left alt keys for A/B.

UPDATE 04/03/2015: Fixed an issue where game wouldn't start because "libgcc_s_dw2-1.dll" was missing.
